sentences.en: At this rate, we could find ourselves in the divorce courts!
sentences.cn: 照这样下去，我们会为离婚闹上法院！

sentences.en: Between ourselves, I know he wants to marry her.
sentences.cn: 我们私下说说，我知道他想娶她。

sentences.en: God gave us the gift of life; it is up to us to give ourselves the gift of living well.
sentences.cn: 生命是上天赐予我们的礼物，能否好好享受这个礼物，取决于我们自己。

sentences.en: I was thinking what a tangle we had got ourselves into.
sentences.cn: 我在想，我们卷入了怎样的纷争之中。

sentences.en: If we did all the things we are capable of doing, we would literally astound ourselves.
sentences.cn: 如果把我们能做到的都做了，最终连我们自己都会被吓到。

sentences.en: It was strange seeing ourselves on television.
sentences.cn: 在电视上看到自己感觉很奇怪。

sentences.en: The people who will suffer won't be people like ourselves.
sentences.cn: 受苦的不会是像我们这样的人。

sentences.en: We all know that when we exert ourselves our heart rate increases.
sentences.cn: 我们都知道太卖命了会导致心跳加速。

sentences.en: We begin to reproach ourselves for not having been more careful.
sentences.cn: 我们开始自责起来，怪自己不够小心。

sentences.en: We delude ourselves that we are in control.
sentences.cn: 我们骗自己说我们掌控着局面。

sentences.en: We drank ourselves into a stupor on cheap wine.
sentences.cn: 我们喝廉价葡萄酒喝得酩酊大醉。

sentences.en: We might be able to push ourselves across with the paddle.
sentences.cn: 我们也许可以用桨把自己推过去。

sentences.en: We prepared ourselves for the long journey ahead.
sentences.cn: 我们为将要开始的长途旅行做好了准备。

sentences.en: We sat round the fire to keep ourselves warm.
We splurged on Bohemian glass for gifts, and for ourselves.
sentences.cn: 我们花了很多钱买波希米亚玻璃制品送人和自用。

sentences.en: We used to doll ourselves up and go into town.
sentences.cn: 我们那时常常打扮得漂漂亮亮然后进城去。

sentences.en: When we stop enjoying ourselves we'll knock it on the head.
sentences.cn: 等玩够了，我们就会结束。

phrases.tran_cn: 见be 条 be oneself, not be oneself
只限于咱们之间；秘密的

trans.tran_cn: “myself”的复数，我们自己，（把）我们自己
trans.tran_en: used by the person speaking to show that they and one or more other people are affected by their own action
